name: Principal Vagina
line: (over the intercom, while the students talk) Principal Vagina here, don't let the name fool you, I'm very much in charge, reminding you that tonight is our annual flu season dance. I don't know how many times I have to say this but if you have the flu, stay home, the flu season dance is about awareness, not celebration. You don't bring dead babies to Passover.

name: Jessica's friend
line: (to Jessica) Hey.

name: Morty
line: Ohhh. Okay, here we go. * walks over to Jessica and her friends* (Nervously) H-Heyy Jessica, ughh.

name: Jessica
line: What's up Morty? *sneezes*

name: Morty
line: Ugghh

name: Brad
line: *butts in* What are you doing?

name: Morty
line: Ummm

name: Brad
line: Wait, wait, Were you about to talk... to her?

name: Morty
line: Well, I mean, I was thinking about it.

name: Brad
line: Dude, Stay in your league! Look at how hot she is! You don't see me going to a bigger school, in a wealthier district and hittin' on their prettiest girl!

name: Jessica
line: (sarcastically) Gee, thanks, Brad.

name: Brad
line: I throw balls far. You want good words, date a languager.

name: Jerry
line: Eh, Try not to worry about it, Morty. You're a good kid, and there's not a premium on that right now, but you'll be getting girls sometime after Brad's out of shape.

name: Morty
line: (Plays with a cookie in sadness) You're missing the point, Dad. I don't want girls, I want Jessica!

name: Jerry
line: Ahhh, well, (gets another jar of sauce out of the cupboard) I remember feeling that way about a young lady named your mom, and that's not an urban dis, your mom was my Jessica. I remember the first time I saw her, I thought...

name: Rick
line: (enters and interrupts Jerry) I should get her pregnant, then she'll have to marry me. (grabs a glass from a cupboard)

name: Jerry
line: I beg your pardon, Rick, INAPPROPRIATE. (points to Morty)

name: Rick
line: (grabs ice from out of the freezer)(sarcastically) Sorry, please proceed with your story about banging my daughter in high school. (gets juice out of the refrigerator) I'm not sure you want to take romantic advice from this guy, Morty, his marriage is hanging from a thread.

name: Jerry
line: (Angrily) My marriage is fine, thank you.

name: Rick
line: Jerry, it's your house, whatever you say it is is how it is, (pours juice into the glass) but I think a blind man could see that Beth is looking for the door. I barely have a reason to care and even I noticed.

name: Morty
line: Come on, Rick, don't talk about my parents like that.

name: Rick
line: Listen, Morty, I hate to break it to you, but what people call "love" is a chemical reaction that compels animals to breed. It hits hard, Morty, then it slowly fades, leaving you stranded in a failing marriage. I did it, your parents are gonna do it. Break the cycle, Morty. Rise above. Focus on science. (exits room, drinking juice)

name: Morty
line: (In woe) Alright, well, I'm gonna go get dressed for the dance. (exits kitchen)

name: Jerry
line: Yeah, I'm just going to...check on your mom. (exits opposite direction)

name: Rick
line: (With his back to Morty) Morty, hand me that screwdriver, huh? *Morty closes door* I'm almost finished making my ionic defibulizer, Morty. It's gonna be great.

name: Morty
line: Hey, listen, Rick. You know how you said that, you know... love is a chemical and all that stuff from earlier? (walks to Rick at his desk) Well, I was thinkn', you know, www... could you make some sort of chemical thing happen inside of Jessica's mind, you know, so where she falls in love with me and all that sort of thing, you know, like maybe make some sort of love potion or something?

name: Rick
line: Morty, that's such a poor use of my time, it's beneath me. Hand me the screwdriver. (points to the shelf)

name: Morty
line: (Angrily) YOU KNOW WHAT, NO RICK! I'M NOT GONNA HAND YOU THE SCREWDRIVER! Uh, I'm never gonna hand you anything ever again, Rick. (Rick gets up and grabs a box of supplies from the shelf) I'm always helping you with this and that and the other thing. Www...what about me, Rick? Www... why can't you just help me out once, once, for once?

name: Rick
line: *sighs* You're growing up fast, Morty. You're growing into a real big thorn straight up into my ass! (grabs some test tubes with yellow liquid and holds one up) Listen, this is called oxytocin. I extracted it from a vole. You know what a VOLE is, Morty, you know what a vole is?

name: Rick
line: It's a, it's a rodent that mates for life, Morty. This is the chemical release in the mammal's brain, (sets down the box of objects, opens a hatch in a machine, and pours the oxytocin in) ...that makes it fall in love. Alright Morty, I just gotta *burps* combine it with some of your DNA.

name: Morty
line: Oh well, okay... (zips down his fly)

name: Rick
line: A hair, Morty, I need one of your hairs! This isn't Game Of Thrones. (plucks hair from Morty's head)

name: Morty
line: Oww!

name: Rick
line: (grabs the flask containing the orange liquid) Alright, Morty, whoever you smear this stuff on will fall in love with you, and only you, forever. Ya happy now, Morty?

name: Morty
line: Heck yeah! Thank you, Grandpa Rick! (walks to the door, but thinks about it and looks back) Hey there's no dangers or anything or side effects, right?

name: Rick
line: Www.. what am I, a hack?! Go nuts, Morty, it's full proof.

name: Rick
line: Ugh, unless she has the flu. (shrugs it off)

name: Jerry
line: Beth, do you still love me?

name: Beth
line: *sighs* Want kinda question is that?

name: Jerry
line: The "yes" or "no" kind. *weak laugh of obviousness*

name: Beth
line: Jerry, do you want homeless people to have homes?

name: Jerry
line: Yess.

name: Beth
line: Are you gonna build them?

name: Jerry
line: Noo.

name: Beth
line: Then what good was the "yes"?

name: Jerry
line: (walks to Beth at the computer)(confused) Wait, iii... is loving me the house or the homeless people?

name: Beth
line: (Turns around to Jerry)(Irritated) Loving you is work, Jerry, hard work, like building a homeless shelter. Nobody want to say "no" to doing it, but some people put the work in. So what do ya say? Do you see me working here? Does this conversation seem tedious to me?

name: Jerry
line: Sort of.

name: Beth
line: But I obviously sort of love you, don't I? *alert on Beth's phone* So stop asking and maybe I'll love you more. (looks at her phone) Crap, They need me at the horse hospital.

name: Jerry
line: This late?

name: Beth
line: (puts on her jacket) The racetrack had a starlit derby, there's a seven horse collision, and Davin's there alone. (leaves the room, leaving Jerry alone)

name: Jerry
line: (In his head)(Progressively angrier) *Davin, Davin, Davin, Davin, Davin, Davin, Davin, Davin*

name: Band Vocalist / MC Haps
line: (Background) Flu. Yo, you gotta be aware. Aware about the flu, up in the air. Imma get me a shot and make the flu go away. Flu hatin' rappers just rappin' away. Yo. Yo. Flu hatin' rapper. It's a flu hatin' rap....This is about flu awareness. Gotta be aware of the flu in the airness. Yo, I'm a flu hatin' rapper. My name is MC Haaaaaaaaaaps- Haps Yeah, I'm MC Haps, I'm a flu hatin' rapper, yo......

name: Morty
line: Hey there, Jessica. (Pretends to trip, wiping the potion on Jessica's arm) Whooa-whoopsie!

name: Morty
line: WOW, thanks!

name: Morty
line: Oh man. I love you too, Jessica! (Brad walks passed with a drink, he overhears)

name: Brad
line: (outraged) *spits* Is this punk bothering you, Jessica?(shoves Morty)

name: Jessica
line: (Infected) LEAVE HIM ALONE, JERK! (pulls Morty away) I'M IN LOVE WITH HIM! HE'S MORE MAN THEN YOU WILL EVER BE! *sneezes*

name: Brad
line: (infected) Aw man, Morty, ugh, I'm really sorry.

name: Morty
line: Oh, well, no problem Brad.

name: Brad
line: (hugs Morty)(infected) There's somethin' special bout you, somethin' special. (squeezes Morty's butt and back)

name: Morty
line: (pushes Brad away) Whoa, take it easy!

name: Jessica
line: (grabs Morty's left arm)(infected) GET YOUR HANDS OFF OF HIM!

name: Brad
line: (grabs Morty's right arm)(infected) BACK OFF I'M TRYING TO BE WITH MY MAN!

name: Principal Vagina
line: (Stops the fight, pulling Brad back, aided with Mr. Goldenfold) That's enough Bradley. We don't want you injuring your ball-throwing arm.

name: Brad
line: (disappointment)(infected) Oh, Principal Vagina.

name: Jessica
line: (infected) Never leave me, Morty, NEVER.

name: Morty
line: (confused) Uh, sure. I mean, of course not. What do you think that was all about?

name: Jessica
line: (infected) Who cares? Just hold me.

name: Brad
line: (infected) LET ME GO!!! I LOVE YOU MORTY! *sneeze, sneeze* (exits the gym)

name: Jerry
line: (V.O.) She's gonna be alone with that guy all night.

name: Summer
line: Yeah, Dad, digging around the inside of horses. It's not a very romantic setting.

name: Rick
line: Well, Summer, there's always the possibility that she made the whole work thing up.

name: Summer
line: Grandpa, so gross!

name: Rick
line: Well, she's my daughter, Summer.

name: Jerry
line: She's not responding to my texts!

name: Summer
line: Careful, dad.

name: Jerry
line: Well, isn't that convenient?

name: Rick
line: Not for the men they cheat on, no.

name: Jerry
line: Okay, I'm... going to go out... for some ice cream.

name: Summer
line: God, grandpa, you're such a dick.

name: Rick
line: I'm sorry, Summer.

name: Summer
line: Screw that.

name: Rick
line: It is?

name: Summer
line: Yeah.

name: Rick
line: Uh-oh.

name: Morty
line: Please just let this work out.

name: Morty
line: Um... can we maybe go somewhere more private?

name: Morty
line: Oh, crap.

name: Rick
line: Morty, come on!

name: Morty
line: [wails] are you okay?

name: Morty
line: I'm fine!

name: Rick
line: I didn't realize when I gave you that serum that Jessica had the flu you know, t-t-t-t-t-t-t-that might have been valuable information for me, Morty.

name: Morty
line: What the hell is going on, Rick?

name: Rick
line: What does it look like?

name: Morty
line: Oh, crap.

name: Rick
line: It's gonna be fine, Morty, relax.

name: Rick
line: Okay, well, sometimes, science is more art than science, Morty.

name: Jerry
line: [gasps]

name: Jerry
line: Nobody's killing me until after I catch my wife with another man.

name: Summer
line: [groans] Come on.

name: Summer
line: What the hell?

name: Summer
line: [screams]

name: Morty
line: Oh, my god, Rick.

name: Rick
line: Yeah, it's pretty wild how fast that spread.

name: Morty
line: Outdone yourself?!

name: Rick
line: Yeah, I don't know what I was thinking.

name: Morty
line: I don't that doesn't make any sense, Rick.

name: Morty
line: What, Morty, you want me to show you my math?

name: Beth
line: Yes, it's satisfying work.

name: Beth
line: Hmm, uh, what are you doing?

name: Beth
line: Oh, ha, um, hey, I b I'd better get going.

name: Beth
line: What is it, davin?

name: Beth
line: What?!

name: Beth
line: Let go of me, davin!

name: Jerry
line: [grunts] You're not Morty.

name: Jerry
line: No.

name: Jerry
line: [grunting] Yeah? Well, look where being smart got you.

name: Beth
line: Jerry! Thank god!

name: Jerry
line: God?

name: Beth
line: Thank you, Jerry.

name: Rick
line: Take a good look down there, Morty, and soak it in, because, you know, once I pull this lever, it's all back to normal.

name: Morty
line: Just do it already.

name: Rick
line: Well, technically, Morty, there's no rush.

name: Morty
line: That's it, Rick!

name: Rick
line: W-what do we have here, Morty?

name: Morty
line: Oh, Rick, something's not right.

name: Rick
line: [sighs] Yeah, you.

name: Morty
line: No, no!

name: Rick
line: Bet you're loving this, Morty.

name: Jerry
line: Hold on.

name: Beth
line: [whimpers]

name: Jerry
line: I wish that shotgun was my pen1s.

name: Beth
line: If it were, you could call me ernest hemingway.

name: Jerry
line: I don't get it, and I don't need to.

name: Summer
line: Mom! Dad!

name: Both
line: Summer!

name: Beth
line: [sighs]

name: Jerry
line: Where's Morty?

name: Summer
line: I don't know.

name: Jerry
line: It's not fair to assume that, Summer.

name: Beth
line: Oh, not fair?

name: Summer
line: Tchoo.

name: Rick
line: Boy, Morty, I really cronenberged the world up, didn't i?

name: Morty
line: Oh, my god!

name: Rick
line: Me irresponsible?!

name: Morty
line: All right, fine.

name: Morty
line: All right, all right, Morty.

name: Morty
line: Wow, Rick, I got to say you really pulled a rabbit out of your hat this time.

name: Rick
line: Come on, Morty.

name: Morty
line: Sure thing, Rick.

name: Rick
line: All right, Morty.

name: Morty
line: Oh, my god, Rick!

name: Rick
line: Calm down, Morty!

name: Morty
line: No, I can't deal with this!

name: Rick
line: Calm yourself, Morty.

name: Morty
line: I can't deal with this, Rick!

name: Rick
line: Calm down, Morty.

name: Morty
line: This can't be real!

name: Rick
line: You got to calm down, Morty.

name: Morty
line: W-w-w-w-we're ripped apart!

name: Rick
line: Shut up and listen to me!

name: Morty
line: This is insane.

name: Rick
line: Look, Morty, I'll grab myself, you grab yourself, okay?

name: Morty
line: Rick, what about the reality we left behind?

name: Rick
line: What about the reality where hitler cured cancer, Morty?

name: Summer
line: You know, the thing about a shark... he's got lifeless eyes... black eyes, like a doll's eyes.

name: Jerry
line: [sighs] You ever wonder what happened to Rick and Morty?

name: Beth
line: Sometimes.

name: Rick
line: Here we are, cronenberg Morty a reality where everyone in the world got genetically cronenberged.

name: Morty
line: Yeah, cronenberg Rick, but, you know, I'm gonna miss cronenberg world, because everyone was cronenberged all along like us from the beginning, you know?

name: Rick
line: Don't you worry about that sort of thing, cronenberg Morty.
